products.name: Purple Hammer
products.description: This purple hammer hits nails harder than a hammer of any other color.

products.name: Blue Screw Driver
products.description: Why stick to safe screwdriver colors like red or grey? Time to ensure you never lose this one in your tool chest.

products.name: Yellow Plunger
products.description: The only plunger you'll ever need, ever again.

products.name: Green Table Saw
products.description: You didn't know you needed this table saw until you saw it. Now, you can't live without it.

products.name: Orange Bidet Seat
products.description: Treat the tushy with the respect it deservers. Temperature controls for water at the perfect temp, every time.

products.name: Indigo Nail Gun
products.description: The only nail gun profesional contractors trust. Those nails won't know what him 'em.

products.name: Light Blue Hand Saw
products.description: You'll definitely feel the burn after a few hours of using this to cut 2x4s down to size.

products.name: Tangerine Pipe Wrench
products.description: A plumber's best friend whether that faucet's got a leak or the toilet won't stop running.

products.name: Lime Green Cordless Power Drill
products.description: Hours of battery life ensure you'll run out of screws before it runs out of juice.

products.name: Navy Bolt Cutters
products.description: Whether you're opening abandoned storage units or breaking into gated warehouses under cover of darkness, these bolt cutters won't let you down.

products.name: Violet Hand-held Orbital Sander

products.name: Red Shop Vac
products.description: Good enough for your shop. Great for vaccuming out your car too.
